# UITextSearchOptions.WordMatchMethod.contains

**Case**

The word contains the search string.

## Declaration

```swift
case contains
```

## Constants

- **UITextSearchOptions.WordMatchMethod.startsWith**: The word contains the search string as a prefix.
- **UITextSearchOptions.WordMatchMethod.fullWord**: The word matches the search string exactly.
